long_description: Built to protect core heat during chilly paddles, the women's NRS HydroSkin(R) 0.5 Shirt gives you just the right amount of warmth for cool days and cool water without feeling bulky or restrictive. 0.5 mm Terraprene(TM) neoprene with heat-reflecting titanium cuts the chill on cool days. 4-way-stretch exterior allows unrestricted movement, and the soft lining feels great against your skin. Paddler-specific design allows unrestricted freedom of movement and puts seams where they won't cause irritation. Spandex fabric under the arms creates friction-free zones for comfortable paddling while improving ventilation where you need it most. A durable water repellent exterior coating sheds water to help reduce evaporative cooling. The women's NRS HydroSkin(R) 0.5 Shirt offers a next-to-skin fit.
short_description: Built to protect core heat during chilly paddles, the women's NRS HydroSkin(R) 0.5 Shirt gives you just the right amount of warmth for cool days and cool water without feeling bulky or restrictive.
